entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning this evening and ending after midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
